title: Identify Faulty Streetlight
description: The smart lighting system reports that a specific streetlight is consuming no power, indicating a fault.

tasks.description: Receive a 'Zero Power Consumption' alert for a specific streetlight ID.
Run a remote diagnostic on the streetlight, which fails to connect.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the light is offline and likely has a bulb or ballast failure.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the lighting maintenance team to replace the faulty component.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and assigns a repair ticket.
